author: bwalding
msg: An alternative way of validating the POM.  Doesn't use the XSD as XSD doesn't take into
account interpolation and inheritance.  This does not replace the XSD validation, merely enhances it.

author: bwalding
msg: If you don't log the error thrown back here it gets lost in a sea of backtraces.
This should help let users diagnose changelog problems for themselves
